Class GameMapControllerFlag.Flag

java.lang.Object
com.game.controllers.GameMapControllerFlag.Flag
Enclosing class:
GameMapControllerFlag
protected static class GameMapControllerFlag.Flag extends Object
Inner class representing a flag in Capture the Flag mode. Stores its position, home base, carrier state, and logic for being picked up, dropped, or returned.

      Returns:

      Returns:

      public int getHomeCol()
      Returns:
      the home column of the flag

    • isAtHome

      public boolean isAtHome()
      Returns:
      true if the flag is at its home position

    • isCarried

      public boolean isCarried()
      Returns:
      true if the flag is currently being carried

    • getCarrier

      public Player getCarrier()
      Returns:
      the player currently carrying the flag, or null if not carried

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int row, int col)
      Sets the flag's position and updates whether it is at its home base.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to set
      col - the column to set

    • pickUp

      public void pickUp(Player player)
      Assigns a player as the carrier of the flag and marks it as taken.
      Parameters:
      player - the player picking up the flag

    • drop

      public void drop(int row, int col)
      Drops the flag at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row where the flag is dropped
      col - the column where the flag is dropped

    • returnHome

      public void returnHome()
      Returns the flag to its home position and clears the carrier.
